    High Risk Indicators

    Project spec analysis revealed 3 critical issues in requirements:
    • Unclear acceptance criteria
    • Unpaid trial task
    • Vague deliverables

    Looking for designer to create 50 screens for fitness app. Need unlimited revisions. Final payment after investor approval.

    Safe Project Criteria

    Reasonable budget: $5,000+ for MVP with defined scope (20 core screens, 2 revision rounds)

    • Clear acceptance criteria
    • Milestone-based payments
    • Defined revision limits

    Frequently Asked Questions

    What is ToxicGuard?

    A platform that protects freelancers from toxic clients. Uses AI to analyze projects for risks like unrealistic deadlines, low budgets, and payment delays.

    How does the risk analysis work?

    Our AI scans project descriptions, identifying 23+ risk factors including budget, deadlines, and payment terms. Results in instant risk assessment.

    How do you protect my data?

    All data is encrypted with 256-bit SSL. We comply with GDPR and don't store personal information.

    How can I join early access?

    Leave your email in the form below - you'll get 3 months free and exclusive updates before the official launch.

    What features are coming next?

    CRM integrations, advanced analytics, AI negotiation assistant. Details in our Roadmap section.

    Which platforms do you support?

    Currently analyzing Upwork and Fiverr projects, with more platforms coming soon.

    Is there a free plan?

    Yes, our Starter plan is free forever with basic risk analysis features.
